verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H6458>Hew<s%> thee <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like unto the <S%H7223>first<s%>: and I will <S%H3789>write<s%> upon these <S%H3871>tables<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that were in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%>, which thou <S%H7665>brakest<s%>.

And be <S%H3559>ready<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and come <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, and <S%H5324>present<s%> thyself there to me in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount<s%>.

And no <S%H376>man<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> with thee, <S%H408>neither<s%> let any <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H7200>seen<s%> throughout all the <S%H2022>mount<s%>; neither let the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> nor <S%H1241>herds<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H4136>before<s%> that <S%H2022>mount<s%>.

And he <S%H6458>hewed<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like unto the <S%H7223>first<s%>; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him, and <S%H3947>took<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, and <S%H3320>stood<s%> with him there, and <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> passed <S%H5674>by<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>, and <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, <S%H7349>merciful<s%> and <S%H2587>gracious<s%>, <S%H750>longsuffering<s%> <S%H639><s%>, and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H2617>goodness<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%>,

<S%H5341>Keeping<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> for <S%H505>thousands<s%>, <S%H5375>forgiving<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and <S%H6588>transgression<s%> and <S%H2403>sin<s%>, and that will by no <S%H5352>means<s%> <S%H5352>clear<s%> the guilty; <S%H6485>visiting<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> upon the <S%H1121>children<s%>, and upon the <S%H1121>children's<s%> children, unto the <S%H8029>third<s%> and to the <S%H7256>fourth<s%> generation.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> made <S%H4116>haste<s%>, and bowed his <S%H6915>head<s%> toward the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, If now I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, let my <S%H136>Lord<s%>, I pray thee, <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> us; for it is a <S%H7186>stiffnecked<s%> <S%H6203><s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>; and <S%H5545>pardon<s%> our <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and our <S%H2403>sin<s%>, and take us for thine <S%H5157>inheritance<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, I <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%>: before all thy <S%H5971>people<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6381>marvels<s%>, such as have not been <S%H1254>done<s%> in all the <S%H776>earth<s%>, nor in any <S%H1471>nation<s%>: and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> which thou art shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: for it is a terrible <S%H3372>thing<s%> that I will <S%H6213>do<s%> with thee.

<S%H8104>Observe<s%> thou that which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>: behold, I drive <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%>, and the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>.

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to thyself, lest thou <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> whither thou <S%H935>goest<s%>, lest it be for a <S%H4170>snare<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee:
But ye shall <S%H5422>destroy<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%>, <S%H7665>break<s%> their <S%H4676>images<s%>, and cut <S%H3772>down<s%> their <S%H842>groves<s%>: images: Heb. statues
For thou shalt <S%H7812>worship<s%> no <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H410>god<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7067>Jealous<s%>, is a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>:

Lest thou <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, and they go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%>, and do <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto their <S%H430>gods<s%>, and one <S%H7121>call<s%> thee, and thou <S%H398>eat<s%> of his <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>;

And thou <S%H3947>take<s%> of their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H2181>make<s%> thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%>.
Thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> thee no <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>.

The <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> shalt thou <S%H8104>keep<s%>. <S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>, as I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee, in the <S%H4150>time<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib<s%>: for in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib<s%> thou camest <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

All that <S%H6363>openeth<s%> the <S%H7358>matrix<s%> is mine; and every <S%H6363>firstling<s%> among thy <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, whether <S%H7794>ox<s%> or <S%H7716>sheep<s%>, that is <S%H2142>male<s%>. sheep: or, kid

But the <S%H6363>firstling<s%> of an <S%H2543>ass<s%> thou shalt <S%H6299>redeem<s%> with a <S%H7716>lamb<s%>: and if thou <S%H6299>redeem<s%> him not, then shalt thou break his <S%H6202>neck<s%>. All the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> thou shalt <S%H6299>redeem<s%>. And none shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H7387>empty<s%>. lamb: or, kid

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> thou shalt <S%H5647>work<s%>, but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> thou shalt <S%H7673>rest<s%>: in earing <S%H2758>time<s%> and in <S%H7105>harvest<s%> thou shalt <S%H7673>rest<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>observe<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>weeks<s%>, of the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H614>ingathering<s%> at the <S%H8141>year's<s%> <S%H8622>end<s%>. year's end: Heb. revolution of the year

<S%H6471>Thrice<s%> <S%H7969><s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> shall all your men <S%H2138>children<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H113>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>GOD<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For I will cast <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, and <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> thy <S%H1366>borders<s%>: neither shall any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2530>desire<s%> thy <S%H776>land<s%>, when thou shalt go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6471>thrice<s%> <S%H7969><s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H7819>offer<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven<s%>; neither shall the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of the <S%H6453>passover<s%> be <S%H3885>left<s%> unto the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

The <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> of thy <S%H127>land<s%> thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>. Thou shalt not <S%H1310>seethe<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> in his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H2461>milk<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3789>Write<s%> thou these <S%H1697>words<s%>: for after the <S%H6310>tenor<s%> of these <S%H1697>words<s%> I have <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with thee and with <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And he was there with the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>; he did neither <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>. And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> upon the <S%H3871>tables<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1697>commandments<s%>. commandments: Heb. words

And it came to pass, when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> with the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, when he came <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mount<s%>, that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3045>wist<s%> not that the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7160>shone<s%> while he <S%H1696>talked<s%> with him.

And when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, behold, the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7160>shone<s%>; and they were <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to come <S%H5066>nigh<s%> him.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto them; and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and all the <S%H5387>rulers<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto him: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> with them.

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H5066>nigh<s%>: and he gave them in <S%H6680>commandment<s%> all that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> with him in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>.
And till <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with them, he <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H4533>vail<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%>.

But when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> with him, he <S%H5493>took<s%> the <S%H4533>vail<s%> <S%H5493>off<s%>, until he came <S%H3318>out<s%>. And he came <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that which he was <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, that the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7160>shone<s%>: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>put<s%> the <S%H4533>vail<s%> upon his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>, until he <S%H935>went<s%> in to <S%H1696>speak<s%> with him.
